level.description: The Robot Priority-Targeting System is almost repaired. It needs to use coordinates in 3 dimensions to be operational. Set <color=#ff0000ff>BREAKPOINTS</color> to check the state of the variables. <color=#ffff00ff>PRINT</color> the <color=#ff0000ff>BREAKPOINT</color> <color=#ffff00ff>output</color>. Identify the bug before you <color=#ff00ffff>WARP</color> to the calculation function. Use the BUGCATCHER to identify the incorrect calculation.
level.introtext: This is the last level! Can you figure out where the last bug is?
